data.name: Atelier Ryza 2: Recipe Expansion Pack "The Art of Synthesis"
data.detailed_description:
Adds new material and Essence recipes.

Note:
- This content will become available after unlocking Recipe Morph and Light Mist in the game.
- Each of the recipes for the additional intermediate ingredients can be prepared by using Recipe Morph on specific items.
- This item is included in the “Atelier Ryza 2 Season Pass” and “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy Ultimate Edition” sets.

fullgame.name: Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy

data.supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, French, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4460 or over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 over or 1280x720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8.1/10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700 or over
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 over or 1920x1080 over display
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
